title.rendered: Air Canada Offers – Summer Sale On Domestic and International Routes

content.rendered:
Get Lowest Fares On Domestic and International Routes for this Summer by Air Canada

  • Great fares on select flights to Canada.

Terms and Conditions

  •  Fares are valid at time of transmission and apply to new bookings only.
  • All fares are the best available at time of purchase based on the number of tickets requested for your preferred travel dates and times. Fares are guaranteed once you purchase your ticket.
  • Some itineraries may require connections. Itineraries involving connection may have higher or different prices due to varying taxes, fees, charges and surcharges. Flights from the U.S. require transfer in Canada.

Offer valid for Limited time period

For more details dial 1800 102 8182

To Book Tickets Click Here

View this deal here

About Air Canada

Air Canada is the flag carrier and largest airline of Canada by fleet size and passengers carried. The airline, founded in 1937, provides scheduled and charter air transport for passengers and cargo to 207 destinations worldwide.
